name: Ricky Iwasaki ye baara kɛ
title: Porozɛw ka Ɛntɛrinɛti ɲɛmɔgɔ
summary: Porozɛw dilannikɛla ŋana, min bɛ cogo kura ɲini ka baara kɛ porozɛbaw la. A b’a fɛ ka kode dilan walima k’a fara a kan walasa mɔgɔ wɛrɛw ka baara kɛ n’a ye. Ne dalen b’a la ko ne ka sekow ka dɔgɔ n’i y’a suma ni ɛntɛrinɛti ye, o de kama n b’a fɛ kosɛbɛ ka baara kɛ ni baarakɛminɛn wɛrɛw ye, ni baarakɛminɛn wɛrɛw ye, ni porogaramukan wɛrɛw ye.

education.school: Kalifɔrni jamana ka Iniwɛrisite min bɛ Fullerton

education.degree: Lise Diplôme (Diplome) min bɛ sɔrɔ Lise la

experience.title: Porozɛw ka Ɛntɛrinɛti ɲɛmɔgɔ
responsibilities: A ye ɛntɛrinɛti baarakɛminɛnw labɛn ani k’u waleya minnu bɛ se ka sɛgɛsɛgɛ ni React ni Node.js ye
A ni fɛn dilanni ɲɛmɔgɔw ye jɛkafɔ kɛ walasa ka wajibiw nɔgɔya ani ka fɛnw lase waati bɛnnen na
RESTful APIw labɛnna ani k’u ladon ɛntɛrinɛti baarakɛminɛnw kama
Scriptw labɛnna walasa ka baara kɛ otomatiki la ani ka baarakɛcogo ɲɛ

experience.title: Tennis ɲɛmɔgɔ dɛmɛbaa
responsibilities: Tenisi fɛɛrɛw kalanni kulu kɔnɔ, ntolatanna 5-10 bɛ min kɔnɔ
Ka kalan kɛ ɲɛnajɛ ni ɲɛnajɛ ye tulonkɛlaw bolo
A ka baara ye ntolatannaw lakanani ye kɛnɛ kan, kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la ntolatanna fitininw ni mɔgɔkɔrɔbaw, i n’a fɔ san 3 ni san 60 denmisɛnw

experience.title: Baarakɛɲɔgɔn min bɛ bɔ kɛnɛ kan
responsibilities: Fɛn minnu bɛ tabali kan, olu bilali kokura
Ka komandiw ta ɛntɛrinɛti kan kiliyanw ye
Packing komandiw ka ɲɛsin cikanw ma
Ka komandiw doni fɛnw lase kamiyɔnw kan
Ka kiliyanw dɛmɛ u ka fɛnw sɔrɔ magasa kɔnɔ
Ka fɛnmarayɔrɔ saniya ani ka a labɛn
Ka sigida lakananen ni teriya kɛ kiliyanw ni baarakɛlaw ye

projects.name: Portefeuille (portfolio) min bɛ yen
projects.description: Site web min bɛ jaabi di, min bɛ porozɛw ni sekow jira ni bi ɛntɛrinɛti fɛɛrɛw ye
